title: How to write an acrostic poem for the word change - Quora

response.answer_text: Remember that acrostics don’t have to use the first letter of each line, but can simply have the letter you want somewhere in the line. You can then Boldface or otherwise highlight the key letter. You should be able to write virtually anything you need to with that opening, I should think. You can try five lines, with the intention of finding one letter that you need - C, H , &c - on each line somewhere. Good luck!

Children everywhere get an education Homosexuals get respect Animals aren’t killed for sport New comers are welcomed with open arms Green house gases are more rare Earth is all around a better place Thats my poem for the word Change, hope you liked it 😝
